gameGoalText: Goal: An educational game for school-age children to promote healthy eating.
disclaimerShort: This application was created within the framework of the Â«5 Steps to Healthy EatingÂ» program of the Ministry of Health of Ukraine with the support of international partners (WHO).
disclaimerText1: This game is for educational purposes only and is intended for general familiarization with the principles of healthy eating. The information presented in the game is not medical advice and cannot replace consultation with a doctor or nutritionist.
disclaimerText2: Before making any changes to your diet, especially if you have chronic diseases, allergies, or special dietary needs, be sure to consult with a specialist.
disclaimerText3: The authors of the game are not responsible for decisions made based on the gaming experience.
privacyText: Zero Data Collection: The application does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data or user identifiers. It is fully compliant with privacy-by-design principles. Local Processing: All game progress is stored locally on the user's device. No data ever leaves your phone or computer.
resultsAndPrizesText: Determination of winners and awarding of prizes is carried out by teachers or local organizers. The developer provides the technical platform and does not participate in the organization or conduct of competitions.
contentText: The game content is based on official methodological recommendations of the Ministry of Health of Ukraine and WHO. However, the presented materials are for informational purposes only and do not constitute personal medical advice. The Ministry of Health of Ukraine and the developer are not responsible for individual interpretation of content or decisions made based on the gaming experience.
volunteerText: This is an open-source educational project developed for the 5 Steps to Healthy Eating program (supported by WHO & Ministry of Health of Ukraine).
openSource: The project has open source code to ensure full transparency and security.
